description:
remove secgroup rule won't cut off existed connections.
e.g. 
1. add a secgroup rule that allow tcp 22 port
2. establish an ssh via 22 port
3. remove the secgroup rule that allow tcp 22 port
4. the established ssh connection won't cut off after removing the rule
title: remove secgroup rule won't cut off existed connections
